name: CreativeInventory
description: The CreativeInventory class provides specialized access to Minecraft's creative mode inventory interface, allowing scripts to interact with creative inventory tabs, search functionality, hotbar management, and item spawning capabilities.
overview:
This class extends the base Inventory class and adds creative mode-specific functionality for browsing item categories, searching items, managing saved hotbars, and directly manipulating inventory contents in creative mode.

Creative mode inventory in Minecraft has the following main components:
- Creative Item Tabs: Categorized item groups (Building Blocks, Decorations, Redstone, etc.)
- Search Tab: Text-based item search functionality
- Inventory Tab: Player's survival-style inventory
- Hotbar Tab: Saved creative hotbar configurations
- Item List: Scrollable list of all items in selected category
- Cursor Stack: Creative mode's ability to hold item stacks on the mouse cursor

methods.name: scroll
methods.description: Scrolls the creative inventory item list.

methods.name: scrollTo
methods.description: Scrolls the creative inventory to a specific position.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position to scroll to (0.0 to 1.0).

methods.name: selectTab
methods.description: Selects a specific creative inventory tab by name.

parameters.name: tabName
parameters.description: The name of the tab to select.

methods.name: selectSearch
methods.description: Switches to the search tab in the creative inventory.

methods.name: selectInventory
methods.description: Switches to the player inventory tab.

methods.name: selectHotbar
methods.description: Switches to the saved hotbars tab.

methods.name: getTabNames
methods.description: Retrieves the names of all available creative tabs.

methods.name: getTabTexts
methods.description: Retrieves the text labels of all available creative tabs.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search in the creative inventory. Requires the search tab to be selected.

methods.name: getShownItems
methods.description: Retrieves the list of items currently shown in the creative interface (filtered by tab or search).

methods.name: setStack
methods.description: Sets the item stack at a specific slot. Useful for spawning items in creative mode.

methods.name: setCursorStack
methods.description: Sets the item stack held on the mouse cursor.

methods.name: destroyHeldItem
methods.description: Destroys the item currently held on the mouse cursor.

methods.name: destroyAllItems
methods.description: Destroys all items in the inventory.

methods.name: saveHotbar
methods.description: Saves the current hotbar configuration to the specified saved hotbar index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index (0-8) to save the hotbar to.

methods.name: restoreHotbar
methods.description: Restores a saved hotbar configuration from the specified index.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The saved hotbar index (0-8) to restore.

methods.name: getSavedHotbar
methods.description: Retrieves the items stored in a specific saved hotbar index.

methods.name: isInHotbar
methods.description: Checks if a specific slot is part of the hotbar.

methods.name: getOffhand
methods.description: Retrieves the item in the offhand slot.

methods.name: getHelmet
methods.description: Retrieves the item in the helmet slot.

methods.name: getChestplate
methods.description: Retrieves the item in the chestplate slot.

methods.name: getLeggings
methods.description: Retrieves the item in the leggings slot.

methods.name: getBoots
methods.description: Retrieves the item in the boots slot.
